mapper.select: INSERT INTO USER_INFO(USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_ADDR, USER_DEADDR, USER_PHONE) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_deaddr}, #{user_phone})
SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_ADDR, USER_DEADDR, USER_PHONE, USER_POINT, USER_LASTLOGIN, USER_DATESUB, USER_UPDATEDATE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_EMAIL = #{user_email}, USER_ZIPCODE = #{user_zipcode}, USER_ADDR = #{user_addr}, USER_DEADDR = #{user_deaddr}, USER_PHONE = #{user_phone} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_LASTLOGIN = sysdate WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
